content.html: Unpopular opinion: If your @jsonschema doesn't say `additionalProperties: false`, then your #API should have an explicit processing model for additional properties. And your sandbox/mock should randomly generate some, just to make sure that forward compatibility will be working.
content.value: Unpopular opinion: If your @jsonschema doesn't say `additionalProperties: false`, then your #API should have an explicit processing model for additional properties. And your sandbox/mock should randomly generate some, just to make sure that forward compatibility will be working.
